|brand = VeloCloud |model = EDGE |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 510-AC |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, SD-WAN Router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TK4WLE600VX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC08G-M325; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CMOS Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64JVSIQ; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D5128EETBPGGBU; |ram1_num = 9 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1543; |sw_cpu = <!-- true --> |sw1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:8E:DB |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;2.02;; |stockos = Linux;3.14.79;VeloCloud OS;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, M.2, USB 2.0, SIM Card slot, M.2 |exp_sim_num = 2 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), 2x SIM Card slot, RTC w/ battery, TPM, heat sink |addchip = Trusted Platform Module;Infineon;SLB;SLB, 9965TT, 2.0;1;,,, Single-Chip USB to UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2104;;1;,,, 256K-bit SPI Serial CMOS EEPROM;OnSemi;CAT25256;;1;,,, 2K-bit I2C BUS EEPROM;Rohm Semiconductor;BR24G02-3;;1;,,, Ultra Fast USB 2.0 Flash Media Controller;SMSC;USB2244;;1;,,, Microcontroller w/ Extreme Low Power;Microchip;PIC16F18344;;1;,,, SimpleLink Multistandard Wireless MCU;Texas Instruments;CC2650;;1;,,, 2.5/3.3V Quad High Bandwidth Switch;Renesas;IDTQS3VH126;;1;,,, Synchronous PWM Switching Converter;OnSemi;NCP3170;;3;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Low Voltage 16-bit I2C I/O Expander;TI;TCA9539;;1;,,, Dual SIM Card Analog Switch;OnSemi;FSA2567;;1;,,, 3.3V 4-bit 2-port Bus Switch;Pericom;PI3C3126;;1;,,, Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Regulator w/ Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NCP81109F;;3;,,, 9A Single-Input Voltage Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3899;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = velocloud-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^velocloud-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/21/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE600VX |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ADI FAB: 80100-0145-F200" and "ADI ASSY: 80300-0145-" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|VeloCloud EDGE 500-N|VeloCloud EDGE 540-AC (5X0)}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 (Dual-core @1.7GHz) *Memory: 4GB (DDR3L) SDRAM (''[[Kingston]]'' D5128EETBPGGBU) *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, 8GB [[Samsung]] Flash via USB *Wi-Fi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9882 (802.11abgn/ac) *PCI: 1x PCIe (used by Wi-Fi), 1x M.2 (M Key) *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *OEM: [http://www.adiengineering.com ''ADI Engineering''] (type [[ADI Engineering Pronghorn SBC250]]) *[https://wan.velocloud.com/rs/098-RBR-178/images/sdwan-712-edge-platform-spec-ds-1020.pdf Platform Specs]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:VeloCloud EDGE 510-AC Top.jpeg|Board Top File:VeloCloud EDGE 510-AC Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:VeloCloud EDGE 510-AC Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
